# CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematicBackgroundStem

**Case**

Isolates the ambience when foreground is cinematic Audio Mix and place it in a spatial stem. There is no voice stem.

## Declaration

```swift
case cinematicBackgroundStem
```
title: CNSpatialAudioRenderingStyle.cinematicBackgroundStem
